tool_description: This API allows you to extract text from an image of a PAN card, which is an important identification document in India.

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch the API result using the request ID received in previous responses.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the request made to the API.

api_list.name: India - Pan card OCR
api_list.description: This API allows you to extract the text present on a PAN card. The PAN card is issued by the National Securities Depository Limited (NSDL) in India.
